price: Уларга (қарши иш қилишда) шошилманг! Биз уларнинг (қилмишларини) ҳисоблаб турамиз.
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
